short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Layouts every day? Designer or web developer? It will help you to check grid or relative positions of elements on page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To check you layout, to be equal to grid. Just put guide lines on page. It very easy to move them in place your needed or rotate, only with your mouse.
